message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $140.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $125 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down a bit more to $135. This is a fair price considering the value it brings. What do you say?
I'm still not sure if $135 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
